title: Yet another feeder but I cope the 15 minute leave penalty... great work RITO!
body:
So.. I have to cope with leave penalties because your client crashes randomly and when i finally get into a game after 2 hours because between crashes and people leaving queue... that's what it takes! I get a freaking Nasus op that goes 0/7/0 by minute 5 basically... and what do you do about those players.... NOTHING.... utterly... NOTHING

What about you penalise everyone with leave that goes with a KDA lower than negative 5 or even negative 6 wit a leave penalty of 20 minutes?

and I mean KDA because if you are a sup you could be 0/6/40

replies.body:
Buddy people have bad games, you have to understand this.

Not every game will someone do amazing, bad games happen. If you tell me that you've never had a game like that Nasus you're a filthy liar. You can't be punished for having a bad game, if it happens consistently enough and they arent just having a bad game then reports will add up and they will receive suspensions. 

I really don't think that you should be giving an input on such a topic if this is the knowledge you have on it, if riot did your method of banning and suspending queue times, the player count would drop so fast and the game would die.
"people have bad games" not an excuse why is the "people have bad games" only ever in my team eveyr single match

I completely understand that people have bad games, i've had them... but when you have a bad game you don't keep just going in after your 4th consecutive death - you stay under tower and farm and wait until later in the game.

Obviously if something like that were to be implemented then the games in which i've been tilted and not gave a crap about it would have costed me queue time.. and i'm totally fine with that as in those game I probably was an arse-ol to the other people in the team.

I'm not saying ban people with kda lower than -6, I'm saying make them cope with a 15 minute queue block... yeah would be slightly higher times for those who don't like to feed nor like people feeding but at the same time the games would have higher quality (in theory). Also, people who don't wanna cope with the longer queue times would stop feeding on purpose - or at least those who care about playing properly and not ruining the games for others.

Mind you tho, I have to admit that I wrote that on a very angry state because i had the client crashing on me multiple times yesterday and costing me a 5 minute blocked queue a couple of times to then move to 15 minute blocked queue... which is unfair as it wasn't me leaving the champ select or cancelling the queue but the client itself crashing..

But then again... why a guy that I've reported a couple of times already called "Lordlemonsour", and yes, i'm doing naming and shaming because he deserves it, is still playing after calling people "Filthy chinese" "Yellow chinese", "Go back to your country", etc.... That's pure run off the mill racism that should have triggered alarms on RITO's side... but nope.. the guy has been playing for quite a while now I've met him in game a few times as said before.
